title: Adorable little girl sings and dances through her sickness
text: Adorable little girl sings and dances through her sickness A rare blood disorder, two bone marrow transplants, and multiple complications can't stop little Leah from dancing and singing. Post to Facebook Adorable little girl sings and dances through her sickness A rare blood disorder, two bone marrow transplants, and multiple complications can't stop little Leah from dancing and singing.  //usat.ly/2llKjWm   Adorable little girl sings and dances through her sickness CLOSE
